Tool selection.name: Postman Beginner's Course - API Testing
Tool selection.description: This course will introduce you to Postman and is suited for beginners. You will learn how to build API requests with Postman, how to inspect responses and create workflows

Html & css.name: Web elements
Html & css.description: In this course, we will use Google Chrome developer tools to look under the hood at the HTML, CSS and JavaScript that make up web pages.

Javascript & Cypress.name: Cypress V6- UI Automation Testing + API Testing + Frameworks
Javascript & Cypress.description: By the end of this course, you will be able to build simplistic to advanced automation tests for any Web Application using Cypress

Javascript & Cypress.name: JavaScript CodeCademy
Javascript & Cypress.description: You will learn programming fundamentals and basic object-oriented concepts using the latest JavaScript syntax. The concepts covered in these lessons lay the foundation for using JavaScript in any environment.

Java & Selenium.name: Java programming
Java & Selenium.description: The material covered here is equivalent to the curriculum of a full semester of Java programming at a university and is designed for complete beginners to programming.

Java & Selenium.name: Java programming - Polish self-learning
Java & Selenium.description: On this page you will find a set of links to articles that will help you learn Java from scratch. I have divided the articles into sections. Each of them has articles to help you learn more about Java programming. Course is a little-bit non-linear, but I believe everyone'll found something for himself in there

Java & Selenium.name: Selenium WebDriver with Java -Basics to Advanced+Frameworks
Java & Selenium.description: By the end of this course,You will be Mastered on Selenium Webdriver with strong Core JAVA basics

Mobile automation.name: Appium with Rahul Shetty
Mobile automation.description: By the end of this course you will be able to automate any (Native,Hybrid,Web) Apps in Android/IOS using Appium
